name: Your Robo Spaceship
description:
Story:
Welcome Player! Are you ready to control a little robot to save your planet? The humans made the entire planet discolored and now you are here to save it. There is no color on the planet so you have to go find it into the Galaxy Colorado. Collect as much as you can, trade with the aliens and upgrade your robot. Also you move only with the recoil of your bullets (you have no fuel system so that's the way you move). Also bring home as much color as possible.
This game was made for GDKO Game Jam - Round 1
The game is not fully completed because I don't have enough time to finish it. (HW and stuff) but the game will be updated if the players enjoyed playing it. Press  " ` " in the game to Open/Close the controls tab
